function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Misallocation of resources leading to inadequate supply of essential medical equipment like masks","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proactive case finding and retesting for covid 19","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health declaration border pass and mobile phone tracking for immigration clearance and quarantine enforcement","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper training and expertise in handling advanced disinfection technologies","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of qualified personnel for waste management and disposal","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or misleading data in the case flow information published by provincial health committees","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate protection and public preventive guidance in the prevention kg may result in the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact on frontline health care workers","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible presence of microbes in the dbaf root bed","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Growing concern about energy consumption in buildings may lead to compromises in air quality and disease control measures","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of indoor microbial pollution due to the use of biofiltration system for degradation of formaldehyde and vocs in the air","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Handling of infectious viral samples in the laboratory","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of viral samples and contaminated materials","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling and cultivation of bacteriophage ms2 and e. coli c3000 may pose a risk of accidental exposure and infection","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of germicidal sources in the built environment during the heating period","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of various sources for heat and cold production may increase the risk of cross-contamination and the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of germicidal emitters or sources may lead to the production of harmful by-products or chemicals","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of environmental impact in the selection of energy sources for germicidal treatment","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for optimal performance of the uv-c fluorescent source","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to monitor uv-c system operating hours and power output","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential exposure to uv-c radiation for maintenance personnel or occupants if not properly shielded or turned off during maintenance","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High international mobility of people posing a difficult-to-predict risk","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenge in achieving community immunity through vaccination due to rejection of vaccines and high pre-vaccination rate requirement","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unemployment leading to economic and social consequences","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inequality in compliance due to practical limitations","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relatively high self-reported compliance with covid-19 mitigation measures","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large reductions in retail and recreational activities, as well as in the usage of public transit, and visits to workplaces","category":"Visitors","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-normative obligation to obey the law","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Participants may have low compliance with covid-19 mitigation measures, increasing the risk of disease spread","category":"Visitors","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Participants may have opportunities to violate covid-19 mitigation measures, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Visitors","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusion of an item due to low cronbachâ€™s alpha may result in a loss of valuable insights or aspects of the phenomenon under study","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Measurement of negative impact and emotions related to covid-19 measures may lead to psychological distress for participants","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of 25 participants providing professional care for covid-19 patients increases the risk of bias in the final sample","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of 7 participants who failed the attention check may lead to a biased final sample","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with stay at home and social distancing measures","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcement of sanctions for non-compliance","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of recommendations from global conferences on economic crisis","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to transform crisis into an opportunity for social and environmental reimagining","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of global leadership in coordinating a response to the crisis","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective regulation of supply chains and global corporations","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rebuilding public healthcare infrastructure","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of global leadership in responding to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Undermining of the who and inadequate global responses to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Over-exploitation of forest and other ecologies leading to imbalance in nature","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited civil liberties due to containment measures","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Authoritarian measures in response to the pandemic","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of neoliberalism as a remedy to pandemic-related failures","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gig workers continue to work despite covid-19 symptoms, increasing the risk of disparities","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"}]}
